page.title: 14RECREATION
page.content: Children play games in the street e.g.40 40 or Kerbie.You have a football and you throw it at the kerb aiming to hit it.If you do you get 1 point.Then the other person has a go.The first person to get 10 points wins.Some children play games in the playground e.g. skipping,hopscotch and British Bulldog.You have about 20/30 people. One person is it.The other people stand in a line,the person picks somebody to try to run over another line without the person who is it catching him.If the person who is it does not say,"no tag,no split tag"after the name of the person,the person who is pickedcan tag another person to run instead.If the first person made it everybody else has to make it over the line,if he or she is caught then they are it.Then it starts again.
